name: Coop Card Game
description:
This Multiplayer Coop Card Game is best played with 2-6 people. There is a Lobby so you can just join in via browser.

Rules and Controls:
- Goal is to empty the draw pile and all your hand cards.
- Drag & Drop Cards from your Deck (top) on the pile you want to drop it on (down).
- There are two decks for card numbers going down, and two for card numbers going up. 
- Communication is the key: Players cannot reveal exact numbers in their hands, but they can warn others not to play on certain discard piles or otherwise make play suggestions.
- Going in the opposite direction is only possible if the card is exactly 10 appart.
- Burning cards need to be "extinguished" by dropping another card on top. If the following player doesnt accomplish that, the game is over.
- Two Cards need to be dropped, before the next turn can be started, except the draw pile is empty, then only one.

GL HF
